Title: French Merchant Ship
Description: Question the crew to reveal the next patrol card in this area and either return it to the top of the deck or discard it.  Then let the ship go or take it as a prize.  If you take it as a prize escalate vs. France.

Title: British Merchant Ship
Description: Question the crew to reveal the next patrol card in this area and either return it to the top of the deck or discard it. You take on 2 food & water.

Title: Italian Merchant Ship
Description: Question the crew to reveal the next patrol card in this area and either return it to the top of the deck or discard it.

Title: Barbary Pirate
Description: Roll ship size with a -4.  She automatically flees.  Roll pursuit and combat to take as a prize.

Title: British Warship
Description: 1D6: 1-3 Question the crew to reveal the next patrol card in this area and either return it to the top of the deck or discard it.  4-5 take on 4 food & water.  6 ordered to a randomly determined adjacent sea area for 4 weeks.

Title: British Fleet
Description: 1D6: 1-3 resupply as if you were at a minor port.  4-6 draw a new Mission Card

Title: Stormy Weather
Description: Place 1 storm card under the current weather card.  May not be discarded when revealed by questioning the crew.

Title: Becalmed
Description: Place 2 Becalmed cards under the current weather card.    May not be discarded when revealed by questioning the crew

Title: Poor Weather
Description: Place 3 poor weather cards under the current weather card.  May not be discarded when revealed by questioning the crew.
